title.rendered: Swabhiman conducts a session on reproductive health and hygiene near Friends Colony

content.rendered: 29 women came together to attend a session on reproductive health and hygiene at a slum cluster near Friends Colony in Bengaluru, Karnataka. The session, conducted under Smile Foundationâ€™s Swabhiman programme, covered vital topics such as early detection of cancer, and prevention and control of AIDS. Besides interactive discussions, interesting games and role plays were included to make the session fun and engaging. These were followed by a question answer round and one-on-one counseling, where the women clarified their doubts.
